lenders.name: JonnyHj
lenders.loan_because: This is something really good.

lenders.name: Lauren and Mark

lenders.occupational_info: I am a Beauty Therapist after 9 years working for the government I finally do what I love.

lenders.name: Jaclyn

lenders.name: Mike

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those in need

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I received a Gift Certificate for my 70th birthday from my 5 siblings and their spouses/partners.  It was a perfect gift and it will grow as my wife and I make loans with our own funds in the future.  We will re-loan the gift we received when it is paid back.
lenders.occupational_info: I have designed buildings, restored historic landmark buildings, and remodelled buildings for over 45 years and plan to continue to do this in the future, thanks in part to the US Social Security payments which I receive.  I also teach beginner skiing and snowboarding in Wisconsin part time in Dec. thru Mar.

lenders.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: I think many people in the world simply need a small amount of assistance in order to achieve great things and that they should not be held back because of the social status, country, or economic background they are born into.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to get justice in the legal system.

lenders.name: michele

lenders.occupational_info: I am in 5th grade.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help sometimes.
lenders.occupational_info: Demanding but satisfying.

lenders.name: VacationCompete.com
lenders.loan_because: Greater economic efficiency is always possible through better information, greater cooperation, and innovative ideas.
lenders.occupational_info: We operate a marketplace where consumers can post their vacation needs and receive competing offers from travel agents, tour operators and the resorts themselves.  Customers compare offers, then contact sellers via phone or e-mail to ask questions or to book.

lenders.name: Marylou
lenders.loan_because: I would like everyone to enjoy the abundance of the universe

lenders.name: Chris

lenders.occupational_info: Every day is a bright new day with all kinds of possibilities.

lenders.name: William

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: every person deserves a chance to prosper and grow.
lenders.occupational_info: In this day and age there is no reason why anyone should not be informed of what is happening throughout the world. I want to make sure that just because I live in an established country, other people in less fortunate countries have a chance to be happy.

lenders.name: Stephanie

lenders.name: Jody

lenders.occupational_info: I empower people and streamline businesses and lives.  Helping people to become more conscious of who they are, then aligning who they are with their world in the personal lives and business through systems and communication.

lenders.name: Linda

lenders.occupational_info: I use to work with the mentally retarded for 23 yrs, but I got injured at work in late 2006, and I'm no longer able to work. I loved working with them, and helping them learn in how to be more independent with themselves. I miss them dearly, but I take with me the compassion and love I received from them in return.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: We are so fortunate in North America and I feel it is our responsibility to help less fortunate people in other countries.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I was once poor also.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers in a business office.

lenders.name: Onno

lenders.occupational_info: I manage communities in the computer and software industry to bring companies, individuals and institutes together to collaborate on projects of mutual interest.

lenders.name: Araxi
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help someone be self sufficient and provide for their families. If someone has the willingness and drive to start  a business then I'm happy to do a small part to help them.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a portrait photographer in the Los Angeles area.

lenders.name: Michael

I can.........YOU GET OUT OF IT,

lenders.loan_because: I can

Currently, I am a master gardener in my community, and  I  volunteer through the county agricultural extension service. I also tutor in No Child Left Behind and for individual students.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: it's one way to demonstrate global citizenship
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computer systems and people to solve business problems.

lenders.name: Sandra and Diane

lenders.name: Manjeet
lenders.loan_because: How could I not do something to lend a hand?

lenders.name: Oscar
lenders.loan_because: I want people to reach their goal in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a tech support for business service in a large company.

lenders.name: Holly

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because:
The sum is greater than the parts.

lenders.occupational_info: I teach teenagers with learning disabilities.

lenders.name: Amy

lenders.occupational_info: I help the doctor take care of animals in need of medical treatment.

lenders.name: Tene
lenders.loan_because: Why Not??... I would rather help someone who will better themselves then buy coffee at Starbucks for the next 5 days. And I have to off set my need to do something for humanity that Im not getting from work.
lenders.occupational_info: I help make environments look more appealing while creating organization. What I do is not essential to life nor does it give back to man in any way shape or form. For that in my personal life I give back to the community as much as possible.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I can and therefore I should

lenders.name: Angelina
lenders.loan_because: I am incredibly blessed to have a healthy child, a supportive husband, a challenging career in the world's finest Navy, an "advanced" education, and a cottage craft business of my very own.  I want others to have the same opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: As a mother and wife, I hold my family together.  As an attorney in the world's finest Navy, I strive to change the world, one person at a time.  Although it's hard to hold on to those ideals at times, that's still my goal.  As an artist, I use yarn and a hook to unwind from the rigidity of my career and the chaos of life.  I am blessed that others find pleasure in the things I make.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I think that Kiva is a great way to invest in other people's dreams and support social entrepreneurship on an accessible level. It's a great feeling to work in solidarity with others through small, but amazing projects for change.

lenders.name: Lollie
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with the resources and opportunities to conquer my passions, I want others to have the same.

lenders.occupational_info: oki love you alli love you alli love you alli love you alli love you alli love you alli love you alli love you all

lenders.occupational_info: helping others improve their environment through artistic and scientific design

lenders.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself, I believe in giving opportunities, in dreams and hard work. I also believe in loans and not donations. It empowers and builds self-esteem.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Information Technology area, I'm passionated about new technologies, but behind that, we have a unique opportunity to access wider networks today. Let's use it.

lenders.name: Kathy

lenders.name: Seana
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we should all start from an equal playing field.

lenders.occupational_info: praying to god , and tell peopel from god

lenders.name: Levi
lenders.loan_because: I know this is crazy, but I live in the same town as the man I'm living to, down the street from the BRAC office.  I started lending with Kiva before I left the first world, and now it's fun to do it with people I can actually meet.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with Hope Destitute Children's Centre, a project supporting destitute and street children, doing fundraising, communication with foreign sponsors, policy creation, design work, teaching, spending time with the kids, facilitating meetings, and a very big ETC.

lenders.name: Chi
lenders.loan_because: 100$ in some countries are more worth than in others.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because:
It's a small thing for me, but a big thing for someone who needs it.
I have been waiting to get to know an organisation like this for years.

lenders.name: titaniumhijau
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: Just love to work anywhere in this world. Thats why i'm freeman. Freelancer!

lenders.name: Luke and Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: We support economic and social justice as part of a complete diet of spiritual practice.
lenders.occupational_info: We fix people's computers. But we also have a non-profit that lends books, shows movies and hosts Symposiums all in the service of increasing community mental and physical health and a healthy environment. We have just started two new businesses - Rainbow Fair Trade Handicrafts and Rainbow Green Services

lenders.name: RAV - Besancon
lenders.loan_because: We are a small wine tasting and buying association. Most of the little money we make is investied in Kiva.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that you need to sow what you want to reap. I am part of a loving family, have never wanted for anything, have always been safe, secure and loved. I feel an absolute need to give back so that others can be as blessed as I am.

lenders.name: Bart
lenders.loan_because: I care about the world you and me live in.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently work as a conservation manager in a nature reserve in the Netherlands. I'm also the founder of a consultanty network taking on environmental & conservation issues. We invest some of our financial assets through kiva.org

lenders.name: ROOTS
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of freelance consultants, focusing on environmental and sustainability issues. A part of our financial assets is invested through kiva.org

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: My pleasure and my responsibility.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: we need to change poverty and the federal government of the USA is not spending my tax dollars like I believe they should, so I am doing my part to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a high school science teacher in the greater Phoenix Area in Arizona, USA.  I work hard to educate my students about the world around them.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my abundance with those less fortunate.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: Give to the World!!! Love the World!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a artist I Draw, Paint, Sculpt, Animate, and build puppets.

lenders.name: Tylor
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to make the world a better place for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: Systematic by nature.

lenders.name: Matthias
lenders.loan_because: I like to have a good feeling about being on this planet and doing something good for other people equal where they are. It is the job of the people who had more luck to help others to let their dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a shop for spirituell products and I have my own. I do marketing, selling and all this business stuff, but what I like the most, is to talk to my customers in the Lichtschloss. I left my job as an engineer to open my eyes for the problems of mankind and I try to help a little bit.

lenders.name: Ada
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of being able to directly improve the lives of industrious people in third world countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people sell and purchase homes.

lenders.name: BBHL
lenders.loan_because: I think the best part about having the little that I can give is using it to help others.It is such a blessing to be able to help others.

lenders.name: Andria
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a marvelous way to help people make better (safer, healthier, more prosperous) lives for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an agency that learns if a youth involved in our juvenile justice system (for commiting crimes) need help with depression or alcohol/drug abuse or other mental health problems. So if there is a problem, then this youth can get the help he needs.

lenders.name: Stella
lenders.loan_because: I have been so blessed in so many ways.  I would like to share my blessings with others.  It takes so little to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work part time helping in an office and part time at home as a mom.

lenders.name: AVO MARKET
lenders.loan_because: AVO wants to keep market culture alive
lenders.occupational_info: Using street markets as a way to explore, share and create dialogues about cultures around the world.

lenders.name: Rebekah
lenders.loan_because: I cannot help but share God's love and mercy with other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I attend Columbia University in New York City, but my home is in Austin, Texas.  At Columbia, I will hopefully be studying English, Theatre, and Italian.

lenders.name: Tapio
lenders.loan_because: I think that we who have been lucky should try help others as well. Simple as that.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a big Nordic bank and try to make sure that our staff have all the information they need to do the work and serve our customers.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: My life has been blessed beyond belief.  What else can I do but give?

lenders.name: Tom and Tina
lenders.loan_because: we believe that the solution to misery within and without our community here is to aid people to sustain themselves...'teach a man to fish'
lenders.occupational_info: i work in the semiconductor manufacturing industry, fabricating microelectronics used in a wide variety of electronic devices.

lenders.name: Hyun
lenders.loan_because: I always wanted to help and this is such a great way to start. I also love the fact that we can meet (sort of) and get to know the people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at DC Shoes (division of Quiksilver) and write corporate reports. I also troubleshoot software issues with users.

lenders.name: Model Metrics
lenders.loan_because:
As part of Model Citizen, Model Metrics’ ongoing corporate giving initiative, Model Metrics contributes 1% of our employees' time, 1% profits and strives to be one with the earth.
Since we were founded in 2003 with an entrepreneurial spirit, we have been fortunate to grow very rapidly. We want to give back to other business owners around the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
100% focus on Cloud Computing Consulting.  Platform expertise includes salesforce.com, Amazon Web Services, Google, Adobe, Apple
8+ years experience working with leading cloud companies
1,200+ Implementations of Cloud based technologies
150+ employees with industry leading certification and experience credentials
Salesforce.com Premier Partner and one of only Three Salesforce Authorized Training Centers for North America
Headquartered in Chicago with offices in Atlanta, Detroit, Los Angeles, Minneapolis, New York, Portland, San Francisco, Denver, and Seattle
1/1/1 Model for Giving

lenders.name: deb
lenders.loan_because: We can spend $25 on carry out food.  If $25 will help someone's life I am honored to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital.

lenders.name: Gurpal Dosanjh
lenders.loan_because: investing in people provides the greatest returns
lenders.occupational_info: I crunch numbers

lenders.name: Alana
lenders.loan_because: I've gone on medical relief trips to Ghana and have seen how a little bit of help can change someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I just graduated from college and am applying to medical school. I'd like to do emergency medicine.

lenders.name: Omolola
lenders.loan_because: Being from a developing country myself, I understand what a huge difference a small loan can make.
lenders.occupational_info: In a nutshell, I find ways to use computers and new computing methods to help physicians and other health professionals do their job better (my field is called biomedical informatics)

lenders.name: lidija
lenders.loan_because: I admire the courage of people working on improving their own future.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in administration, finance, and communications, along with a bit of design on the side.

lenders.name: Katelyn
lenders.loan_because: Doing small things with great love.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because:
Be a lamp, or a lifeboat, or a ladder. 
Help someone's soul heal. 
Walk out of your house like a shepherd. 
         -Jalaluddin Rumi, poet and mystic (1207-1273)
lenders.occupational_info: My spiritual practice includes teaching and nurturing high school students. I am blessed.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: Jesus is my financial adviser.
lenders.occupational_info: Every day, I try to make people excited about math and that sort of thing.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to assist individuals by giving them access to capital for their businesses with the hope that their success leads them out of, or keeps them from, poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired banker

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: The world is a small place.

lenders.name: Andras
lenders.loan_because: our friend, John, the best tuk-tuk driver in Siem Riep, Cambodia, showed us how small businesses give the best hope for development.

lenders.name: John Patrick
lenders.loan_because: of the need financially. I am planning to buy a computer so that I could do lay-outing works so that I could earn money for my studies and to help my family

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Amelia
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a loan sometimes.

lenders.name: kenny
lenders.loan_because: for making a book about adventure of a jungle dragon of losing in the world
lenders.occupational_info: I write in my computer or my blog in internet and go on..writng...writing...writing....writing.... to reach in finished in a book and sell for children in the world

lenders.name: Sierra Visher
lenders.loan_because: I'm a Former Kiva Fellow! I feel a real need to promote the idea of a global community and think that Kiva is a wonderful marriage of personal and financial connections.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Masters student of Public Administration hoping to work in international development

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I love Jesus!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach music to children in kindergarten through 8th grade.

lenders.name: bian
lenders.loan_because: I come from a rural students, because some incidents in the home, school funding needs

lenders.name: Tangos
lenders.loan_because: I believe micro-credit can change world.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: it makes me happy.

lenders.name: Laurent Condon
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microfinance can make a difference in Africa.

lenders.name: Kirsty
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others the chance to own their own business and have a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I market other people's products on the internet.

lenders.name: Nicki (KF9)
lenders.loan_because: i've now seen first hand that microfinance can work....under the right conditions!
lenders.occupational_info:
I worked with Kiva for 6 months as a Kiva Fellow in Senegal between December 2009 and April 2010. Before that I was working as a management consultant advising on business strategies.

Having got a taste of microfinance 'in the field' I am currently pursuing a Masters degree in Development Studies and hope to continue to work in the sector.

lenders.name: marina
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference even though its on a smaller scale.

lenders.name: Jutta
lenders.loan_because:
I am glad that I am able to.
Money is like energy - it should flow.
lenders.occupational_info: I have my own business in prepress.

lenders.name: Nina & Ron
lenders.loan_because: To help people to live their dreams and give them the opportunity to work what they want to.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I feel that it is a tremendous opportunity to give resources to people who are hard working and desire to make their lives better.  I also think Jessica Flannery is a modern day hero.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying business to help people learn how to invest for the future.

lenders.name: mark
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people and make a difference in their lives

lenders.name: Bahadour
lenders.loan_because: it makes sense

lenders.name: Bartek
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Consultant

lenders.name: Michal
lenders.loan_because: Because I was born in the poor and non-free country, and now I live in a prosperous country, without even moving. Unfortunately, not everyone had such good luck.
lenders.occupational_info: Working as a manager in the company, which deals with the media audience research and development software.

lenders.name: McGinnis
lenders.loan_because: we want to help and encourage creative entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of middle schoolers in the United States learning about the world.

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of the individual. Solutions to global poverty  already exist--by harnessing the power of the market and individual initiative people can help one another to make real change.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: It feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the author of Zigzag Men, a novel about helicopter flying in the Vietnam war.

lenders.loan_because: We want to do our little part to support enterpreneurs who have the strenghts but not the recources.
lenders.occupational_info: We both are in the sporting goods industry. Our hobby became our life and we are involved in creating and selling sporting goods.
